channel.title: RestorationX 667/729 [Project]
channel.description:
Hello I have been developing this server for a few months I've just recently added the Grand Exchange but let me start off with a list of things that are added, being worked on and more to come
Green = Done/Currently Worked on [% Done next to the Project. Red = Not started
GrandExchange 70% Done Squeal Of Fortune 80% Done Max Custom Dialogue 100% Done Polypore Dungeon 100% Done Jadinko 100% Done Custom Home 100% Done Added New Shop Dialogue For Armours/Weapons 100% Done Dungeoneering 90% Done And More..!!!!
Adding Selling To GrandExchange Adding Custom Minigame Finishing Dung. Adding Fulling working Vote4Cash Adding Loyalty Points Forums [Need a Forum Developer] Grand Exchange Prices Will add more soon..!!!!
Staff Owner/Coder: [Jesse|Beast] Admins: [] Mods: [Ben] Forum Developer: [] --- NEEDED
Pics Sunday
